20101228004615.000|20101228004616.000|CC1|SMALL SHAKE OR SMALL FRY, IF    
20101228004616.000|20101228004617.000|CC1|YOU LOOK AT THE CALORIE         
20101228004617.000|20101228004619.000|CC1|BOARDS, YOU'LL FIND THE         
20101228004619.000|20101228004624.000|CC1|FRENCH FRIES ARE OVER 300       
20101228004624.000|20101228004625.000|CC1|CALORIES LESS.                  
20101228004625.000|20101228004628.000|CC1|>> THERE'S STILL SOME DEBATE    
20101228004628.000|20101228004629.000|CC1|OVER WHETHER OR NOT VITAMINS    
20101228004629.000|20101228004630.000|CC1|ARE BENEFICIAL.                 
20101228004630.000|20101228004633.000|CC1|BUT THERE'S A NEW STUDY OF      
20101228004633.000|20101228004635.000|CC1|VITAMIN D MAKING BABIES         
20101228004635.000|20101228004636.000|CC1|BREATHE EASIER.                 
20101228004636.000|20101228004638.000|CC1|RESEARCHERS FOUND PREGNANT      
20101228004638.000|20101228004642.000|CC1|WOMEN TAKE VITAMIN B

20101228004647.000|20101228004648.000|CC1|BREATHING PROBLEMS.

20101228004653.000|20101228004655.000|CC1|AT BIRTH HAVE LOWER RISKS

20101228004706.000|20101228004718.000|CC1|TRANSPOLMETOLAIC IN MILK,       
20101228004718.000|20101228004720.000|CC1|CHEESE, CAFFEINE AND BUTTER.

20101228004722.000|20101228004723.000|CC1|DIABETES.
